name: pizza-ordering-system
description: Full-stack Pizza Ordering System with Advanced Security

scripts.install-all: npm install --prefix backend && npm install --prefix frontend
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix backend" "npm run dev --prefix frontend" --names "BACKEND,FRONTEND" --prefix-colors "blue,green"
scripts.build:production: cd backend && npm install --production && cd ../frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.setup: npm run install-all && npm run setup:env
